Package com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.model.util.tags

Class DataParser

java.lang.Object
com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.model.util.tags.DataParser
public class DataParser extends Object
Parses the String representation of Object, and returns the value of the field of an Object by the name of that field.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final String
    SPLIT_BY_COMMA
    Regular expression to split String by commas, but not that commas that is enclosed in quotation marks, as such commas can be inside whole sentence.

  • Field Details

    • SPLIT_BY_COMMA

      private static final String SPLIT_BY_COMMA
      Regular expression to split String by commas, but not that commas that is enclosed in quotation marks, as such commas can be inside whole sentence.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • getItem

      public String getItem(String object, String key)
      Method receives String representation of object and String key by which value should be extracted from the object. The values in object can be enclosed in quotation marks - String ones, and cannot be enclosed in quotation marks - Numeric values. That is different method implies to extract that object.
      Parameters:
      object - String that represent some Object.
      key - by which value should be extracted, that is the name of an object field.
      Returns:
      String value extracted from object, that is actually the value of an object field.

    • getNumberValue

      private String getNumberValue(String field)
      Parameters:
      field - of object represented by String, that contains the value.
      Returns:
      value that is extracted from the field and that is not enclosed in quotation marks.

    • getStringValue

      private String getStringValue(String field)
      Parameters:
      field - of object represented by String, that contains the value.
      Returns:
      value that is extracted from the field and that is enclosed in quotation marks.

    • getRow

      private String getRow(String[] fields, String key)
      Method searches a String in Strings array that contains the key.
      Parameters:
      fields - array of Strings that represent object fields as data split by delimiters.
      key - by which value should be extracted.
      Returns:
      String in with key and value is present.
